title: Restructure journey flow with two videos and campfire ending

requirements.text: Modify the journey flow to use exactly two videos: the first video plays at journey start and leads to a rest point/break point, the second video plays after continuing from the rest point and leads to the halt issue

quotes: only two videos is to be used one when starting then rest point/break point appears when clicking anywhere and then continuing journey another video appears clicking anywhere issue appears

acceptanceCriteria: First video plays when journey starts
Clicking anywhere after first video shows rest point/break point
Second video plays after continuing from rest point
Clicking anywhere after second video triggers the halt issue overlay

requirements.text: After resolving the halt issue, display the night road static image (existing golden hour/night scene), then clicking anywhere shows the destination arrived screen with the campfire image

quotes: after resolving issue night image appears and clicking anywhere the destination(check point 1) and campfire appears
the campfire image should be at the end of the app after resolving the issue night road image has to be shown and then clicking anywhere the destination arrived campfire image

acceptanceCriteria: Night road static image displays after issue is resolved
Clicking the night road image advances to destination/campfire screen
Campfire image appears on the final destination screen

requirements.text: Remove any intermediate travel videos or scenes between the rest point and the halt issue to ensure only two videos are used in the entire flow

quotes: only two videos is to be used

acceptanceCriteria: No additional travel videos play between rest point and issue
Flow proceeds directly from rest point continue to second video

requirements.text: Update the flow state machine in useRVFlow hook to support the new sequence: start → video 1 → rest point → video 2 → issue → night image → campfire destination → completion
acceptanceCriteria: State transitions follow the exact sequence specified
All intermediate states are properly handled
Click-to-continue works at each interactive stage

requirements.text: Ensure the campfire destination screen is the final celebration screen before trip completion, displaying the campfire image from the assets

quotes: the campfire image should be at the end of the app

acceptanceCriteria: Campfire screen displays after clicking the night road image
Campfire image is visible and properly rendered
Continue button advances to trip completion

constraints: Use exactly two videos total in the entire journey flow
Maintain existing checkpoint data structure and action items
Preserve existing audio effects and ambient sounds
Keep existing UI components for overlays and screens where applicable
nonGoals: Adding new checkpoints beyond the existing structure
Changing video content or creating new video files
Modifying the halt issue quiz questions or answers
Redesigning the visual theme or color scheme
